title: Hardware Systems Engineer - Power Analysis and Modeling
summary: This is an exciting role in which you would influence Apple Watch through a potent combination of system modeling and hands-on characterization! You will be part of a team that drives the battery life modeling projections and optimizations for the various sub-systems of the Apple Watch, thereby making a deep impact on it’s architectural definition and performance. Using analysis and coding skills, you would model the power consumption of the unique features that make the Apple Watch best-selling smartwatch worldwide. At the same time you would be validating these features through hand-on characterization. Ultimately, you would be using this advanced system modeling and hard data to influence various teams across Apple to optimize power consumption while delivering the most delightful user-experience!
description:
- Generate battery life projections for the team. 
- Driving battery life modeling, projections, optimizations, etc. 
- Define, develop, and use tools, scripts for system modeling and analysis; tool and model development / maintenance. 
- Power validation, testing, and characterization. 
- Characterization of HW and SW feature power vs performance across product releases. 
- Analysis of characterization results to help drive power optimizations across Apple Watch system. 
- Specify, negotiate, and document system power management & user level behaviours. 
- Cross-functional collaboration with module and SW teams. 
- Build internal and external system specifications. 
- Review & influence system performance decisions.
key_qualifications:
Experience in power management modeling and energy-efficient system design.
Scripting expertise (Python, C++ proficiency would be a plus).
Experience with lab measurements, characterization, debugging.
Excellent written and verbal communication/presentation skills.
Beyond technical capability, we prize curiosity, creativity, team-work and a passion for learning.
Experience in wearable and/or mobile platforms would be a plus.
education_experience: BS or MS Degree in technical discipline.
